snippet: Two parts of Robert Ashley’s “Perfect Lives,” in a Spanish incarnation translated by Javier Sainz de Robles, were shown at the Whitney Museum on Thursday.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews Vidas Perfectas, Spanish translation of Robert Ashley's sung-spoken opera Perfect Lives, at Whitney Museum of American Art.
lead_paragraph: Two parts of Robert Ashley’s “Perfect Lives,” in a Spanish incarnation translated by Javier Sainz de Robles, were shown at the Whitney Museum on Thursday.

headline.seo: ‘Vidas Perfectas,’ Spanish Version of a Robert Ashley Opera
